snippet.title: Detached Story Teaser I Release Date Announcement (PC VR)
snippet.description:
The Detached PC VR launch date is set for 05/18/17 with HTC Vive and Oculus Rift support. Play the Early Access version of the game now!
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/436230/
Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/945551678861092/

Things did not go according to plan. But then out here nothing ever does. A simple salvage operation took an unexpected turn. The truth is, in the vastness of space you have to be prepared for whatever comes your way – and for the fact that no one you encounter is going to be your friend…

You’re left at the edge of a universe destroyed by human misrule and extortion. Thanks to years of warfare and greed, the human colonies in deep space are no more. The great factions have crumbled; the corrupt corporations have dissolved. You have to race against borrowed time to find your crew before your oxygen supply runs out. But this is only the beginning…

Do you have what it takes to survive in a zero-gravity environment? Only players with an iron stomach will be able to withstand these extreme conditions. Experience the vastness of space with an intense feeling of immersion. Designed for VR devices only, Detached recreates outer space, inviting you to prove that you are one of the few who can survive as an astronaut.

Single-player mode makes full use of the VR headset, giving you the chance to interact with the tranquil expanse of space. Multiplayer mode pits you against your friends in an entirely new take on capture the flag. Race against each other to gather the necessary skills and complete your mission.

For more information about the game, visit:

Website: http://detachedgame.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DetachedGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DetachedGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ansharstudios/
